title: Mobis Patent System in Hyundai Mobis
description: I updated the Mobis Patent System at Hyundai Mobis to support multiple languages, tailored to the user's location or preferences. This enhancement improves accessibility for users across different regions, allowing them to interact with the system in their preferred language.

skills: Programming: Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, JSP, JSTL, XML
jd: Created and modified JSP, JSTL, and properties files to enable language preference selection within the system.
Changed data schemas and drew Entity-Relationship Diagrams (ERDs).
Conducted unit testing and integration testing.
Prepared draft versions of technical documentation and end-user manuals.
